pageProps.data:
## Basic

###### Description

Basic mathematical operations

## Sub

###### Description

Pixel-wise substruction A - B

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The first input|
|**tB**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The second input|

###### Example

```js
gm.sub(A, B);
```

## Add

###### Description

Pixel-wise sum A + B

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The first input|
|**tB**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The second input|

###### Example

```js
gm.add(A, B);
```

## Div

###### Description

Pixel-wise divide A / B

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The first input|
|**tB**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The second input|

###### Example

```js
gm.div(A, B);
```

## Mult

###### Description

Pixel-wise muliply A * B

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The first input|
|**tB**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The second input|

###### Example

```js
gm.mult(A, B);
```

## SubScalar

###### Description

A - scalar

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Input|
|**scalar**|<var>number</var>|Scalar|

###### Example

```js
gm.subScalar(A, 0.5);
```

## AddScalar

###### Description

A + scalar

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Input|
|**scalar**|<var>number</var>|Scalar|

###### Example

```js
gm.addScalar(A, 0.5);
```

## DivScalar

###### Description

A / scalar

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Input|
|**scalar**|<var>number</var>|Scalar|

###### Example

```js
gm.divScalar(A, 0.5);
```

## MultScalar

###### Description

A * scalar

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tA**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Input|
|**scalar**|<var>number</var>|Scalar|

###### Example

```js

```
